/*   Anurag Anand  */

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cassert>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include<cmath>

using namespace std;

inline int input()
{
       char c=getchar();
       int n=0;
       while(c<'0' || c>'9') c=getchar();
       while(c>='0' && c<='9') n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0',c=getchar();
       return n;
}

int main()
{
    int nCase;
    scanf("%d",&nCase);
    while(nCase--)
    {
       int primeNum;
       //scanf("%d",&primeNum);
       primeNum=input();
       if(primeNum==2) printf("YES\n");
       else if(primeNum%4==1) printf("YES\n");
       else printf("NO\n");
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;  
}
